snippet: Rickie Fowler won the Wells Fargo Championship in a playoff that included the world’s new No. 1 player, Rory McIlroy.
abstract: Golf Roundup; Rickie Fowler captures three-man playoff to win Wells Fargo Championship golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler won the Wells Fargo Championship in a playoff that included the world’s new No. 1 player, Rory McIlroy.

headline.seo: Fowler Captures Playoff for First PGA Tour Victory
headline.main: Fowler Likes His New Label: Champion
headline.print_headline: Fowler Likes His New Label: Champion
